name: WebGL2RenderingContext.copyBufferSubData
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.copyBufferSubData() method of the WebGL 2 API copies part of the data of a buffer to another buffer.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'copyBufferSubData' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
